sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { useForm } from "react-hook-form";
import "./Form.css";
class Form extends React.Component {
  
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    
    this.state = {
      usersname: '',
      gender: '',
      age: '',
      gradYear: '',
      program: '',
      degree: '',
      firstPosition: '',
      daysSearching: '',
      yearsExperince: '',
      positionTitle: '',
      positionCompany: '',
      whereWork: '',
      employmentType: '',
      stateResided: '',
      negotiate: '',
      salary: '',
      errors: ''
    };
    
    this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this);
    this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this);
  }
  
  handleChange(e) {
    e.target.classList.add('active');
    
    this.setState({
      [e.target.name]: e.target.value
    });
    
    this.showInputError(e.target.name);
  }
  
  handleSubmit(e) {    
    e.preventDefault();
    
    console.log('component state', JSON.stringify(this.state));
    
    if (!this.handleValidation()) {
      console.log('form is invalid: do not submit');
    } else {
      console.log('form is valid: submit');
    }
  }
  
  handleValidation() {
    let fields = [this.state.gender, this.state.age, this.state.gradYear, this.state.program,
      this.state.degree, this.state.firstPosition, this.state.daysSearching, this.state.yearsExperince,
      this.state.positionTitle, this.state.positionCompany, this.state.whereWork, this.state.employmentType,
      this.state.stateResided, this.state.negotiate, this.state.salary
    ];
    let errors = {};
    let formIsValid = true;

    fields.map(field => {
      if (field === '') {
      formIsValid = false;
      errors = "Fields cannot be empty";
    }
     this.setState({ errors: errors });
     return formIsValid;
    })
  }

  contactSubmit(e) {
    e.preventDefault();

    if (this.handleValidation()) {
      alert("Form submitted");
    } else {
      alert("Form has errors.");
    }
  }

  render (){
    return (
    <form novalidate>
      <label>
        Name:
        <input
           className="name-control"
            type="name"
            name="usersname"
            ref="usersname"
            value={ this.state.usersname } 
            onChange={ this.handleChange }
            required
        />
      </label>
      <label>
        Gender:*
        <select
            className="gender-control"
            type="gender"
            name="gender"
            ref="gender"
            value={ this.state.gender } 
            onChange={ this.handleChange }
            required>
          <option value="" disabled selected>
            Gender
          </option>
          <option value="Woman">Woman</option>
          <option value="Man">Man</option>
          <option value="Transgender">Transgender</option>
          <option value="Non-binary/non-conforming">
            Non-binary/non-conforming
          </option>
          <option value="Prefer not to respond">Prefer not to respond</option>
        </select>
      </label>
      <label>
        Age:*
        <select
          className="age"
          type="age"
          name="age"
          ref="age"
          value={ this.state.age } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
        >
          <option value="" disabled selected>
            Age
          </option>
          <option value="18-24">18-24</option>
          <option value="25-34"> 25-34</option>
          <option value="35-44"> 35-44</option>
          <option value="45-54"> 45-54</option>
          <option value="55-64"> 55-64</option>
          <option value="65+"> 65+</option>
        </select>
      </label>
      <label>
        Year Graduated:*
        <select 
          className="gradYear"
          type="gradYear"
          name="gradYear"
          ref="gradYear"
          value={ this.state.age } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
        >
          <option value="" disabled selected>
            Year Graduated
          </option>
          <option value="2022">2022</option>
          <option value="2021">2021</option>
          <option value="2020">2020</option>
          <option value="2019">2019</option>
          <option value="2018">2018</option>
          <option value="2017">2017</option>
          <option value="2016">2016</option>
          <option value="2015">2015</option>
          <option value="2014">2014</option>
        </select>
      </label>
      <label>
        Program:*
        <input
          className="backend"
          type="radio"
          name="backend"
          ref="backend"
          value={ this.state.program} 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
        />
        BE
        <input
          className="frontend"
          type="radio"
          name="frontend"
          ref="frontend"
          value={ this.state.program } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
        />
        FE
      </label>
      <label>
        Years of Experience:*
        <input
          className="yearsExperience"
          type="number"
          name="yearsExperience"
          ref="yearsExperience"
          value={ this.state.yearsExperience } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
        />
      </label>
      <label>
        Degree?:*
        <select 
          className="degree"
          name="degree"
          ref="degree"
          value={ this.state.degree } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
          >
          <option value="" disabled selected>
            Degree Type
          </option>
          <option value="NO DEGREE">NO DEGREE</option>
          <option value=" NOT CS RELATED"> NOT CS RELATED</option>
          <option value=" CS RELATED"> CS RELATED</option>
        </select>
      </label>
      <label>
        State you resided in during this position:*
        <select 
          className="stateResided"
          name="stateResided"
          ref="stateResided"
          value={ this.state.stateResided } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
          >
          <option value="" disabled selected>
            State
          </option>
          <option value="AK">AK</option>
          <option value="AL">AL</option>
          <option value="AR">AR</option>
          <option value="AS">AS</option>
          <option value="AZ">AZ</option>
          <option value="CA">CA</option>
          <option value="CO">CO</option>
          <option value="CT">CT</option>
          <option value="DC">DC</option>
          <option value="DE">DE</option>
          <option value="FL">FL</option>
          <option value="GA">GA</option>
          <option value="GU">GU</option>
          <option value="HI">HI</option>
          <option value="IA">IA</option>
          <option value="ID">ID</option>
          <option value="IL">IL</option>
          <option value="IN">IN</option>
          <option value="KS">KS</option>
          <option value="KY">KY</option>
          <option value="LA">LA</option>
          <option value="MA">MA</option>
          <option value="MD">MD</option>
          <option value="ME">ME</option>
          <option value="MI">MI</option>
          <option value="MN">MN</option>
          <option value="MO">MO</option>
          <option value="MP">MP</option>
          <option value="MS">MS</option>
          <option value="MT">MT</option>
          <option value="NC">NC</option>
          <option value="ND">ND</option>
          <option value="NE">NE</option>
          <option value="NH">NH</option>
          <option value="NJ">NJ</option>
          <option value="NM">NM</option>
          <option value="NV">NV</option>
          <option value="NY">NY</option>
          <option value="OH">OH</option>
          <option value="OK">OK</option>
          <option value="OR">OR</option>
          <option value="PA">PA</option>
          <option value="PR">PR</option>
          <option value="RI">RI</option>
          <option value="SC">SC</option>
          <option value="SD">SD</option>
          <option value="TN">TN</option>
          <option value="TX">TX</option>
          <option value="UM">UM</option>
          <option value="UT">UT</option>
          <option value="VA">VA</option>
          <option value="VI">VI</option>
          <option value="VT">VT</option>
          <option value="WA">WA</option>
          <option value="WI">WI</option>
          <option value="WV">WV</option>
          <option value="WY">WY</option>
        </select>
      </label>
      <label>
        Salary:*
        <input
          className="salary"
          name="salary"
          type="number"
          ref="salary"
          value={ this.state.salary } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
        />
      </label>
      <label>
        Position Title:*
        <input
          className="positionTitle"
          name="positionTitle"
          type="text"
          ref="positionTitle"
          value={ this.state.positionTitle } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
        />
      </label>
      <label>
        Type of Employment:*
        <input
          className="part-time"
          name="part-time"
          type="radio"
          ref="part-time"
          value={ this.state.employmentType } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
        />
        Part-Time
        <input
          className="full-time"
          name="full-time"
          type="radio"
          ref="full-time"
          value={ this.state.employmentType } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
        />
        Full-Time
        <input
          className="contract"
          name="contract"
          type="radio"
          ref="contract"
          value={ this.state.employmentType } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
        />
        Contract
        <input
          className="intern"
          name="intern"
          type="radio"
          ref="intern"
          value={ this.state.employmentType } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
        />
        Intern/Apprentice
      </label>
       <label>
        Location of Employment:*
        <input
          className="in-person"
          name="in-person"
          type="radio"
          ref="in-person"
          value={ this.state.whereWork } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
        />
        In-Person
        <input
          className="hybrid"
          name="hybrid"
          type="radio"
          ref="hybrid"
          value={ this.state.whereWork } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
        />
        Hybrid
        <input
          className="remote"
          name="remote"
          type="radio"
          ref="remote"
          value={ this.state.whereWork } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
        />
        Remote
      </label>
      <label>
        Did you negotiate the salary?:*
        <input
          className="yes"
          name="yes"
          type="radio"
          ref="yes"
          value={ this.state.negotiate } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
        />
        Yes
        <input
          className="no"
          name="no"
          type="radio"
          ref="no"
          value={ this.state.negotiate } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
          required
        />
        No
      </label>
      <label>
        {" "}
        Company Name:
        <input
          className="position-company"
          name="position-company"
          type="text"
          ref="position-company"
          value={ this.state.positionCompany } 
          onChange={ this.handleChange }
        />
      </label>
      <input type="submit"/>
    </form>
    )
}
}
export default Form
